Title: Reptile Boy
Plot: Becoming fed up with Giles' rules and guidelines, Buffy makes an unusual friendship with Cordelia when she accompanies her to a fraternity party where they are both drugged and used in the ritual feeding of a demon.
GuestStars: Coby Bell, Jason Posey, Christopher Dahlberg, Robin Atkin Downes, Greg Vaughan, Todd Babcock, Jordana Spiro, Kavan Smith, Danny Strong
